about_the_game:
Zero Medal - The Galaxy Champions is an action game with comic book characters created by Roger Ferraz in the classic beat 'em up style that made great titles famous in the 80s and 90s.

Choose your favorite character from the Zero Medal comics series: Garra, Sombra, Pintado and Juba (as well as the secret characters Sabre and Pandora), alone or with a friend, and use combos and special moves to face epic battles.

The story of Zero Medal - The Galaxy Champions begins right after the events of issue 4 of the comic books. Garra, Sombra, Pintado and Juba were created in an alien laboratory by Dr. Mente by mixing human and felines DNA from planet Earth with the goal of becoming living weapons and harnessing the ultimate power hidden in each of their Universe Medals: the Zero Medal. However, Garra lost his memory during a mission and fell in love with Pandora, a young police officer who is looking for her missing brother. Dissatisfied with the results of his experiments, Dr. Mente decides to discard his creations. Now, Garra and his foster brothers fight for survival and for control of their own destinies.

● Nostalgic atmosphere with characters created in the 90s

● Fluid animations

● Simple gameplay

● Up to 2 players simultaneously

● Gameplay variation with motorcycle and spaceship stages.

● Museum with unlockable items such as cards, comics and concept art.

● 15 action stages.
